thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses Canada | smartbuyglasses.ca
thread.title: Debra

author: Debra
title: Debra
text:
This was my first purchase from SmartBuy Glasses, I did my homework first. Found they had a good reputation BEFORE I placed my order.
Shopped around tried on glasses for colour and fit.
I purchased the exact same frames from SmartBuyGlasses and saved an exceptional amount of money.
Two other points that make a good online company.
1.Very good service, I asked questions and received fast response.
2. My product is exactly as it was described.
I will order again.
